message.body: Happy half birthday... 2 questions. 1. What's your view on fennel? 2. Do you have an opinion on guacamole? Discuss
Lol. Thanks! Knock yourself on the fennel (btw anise is fine in sausage, too). My opinion on guac is a strong, positive one.
Okay... good to both. I may do guacamole too only because I got some awesome perfect ripe avocados yesterday
See you tonight! If you think of anything random you may need let me know
